title: HDAC6 inhibition as a mechanism to prevent neurodegeneration in the mSOD1<sup>G93A</sup> mouse model of ALS
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Andrew J. Phipps, Samuel Dwyer, Jessica M. Collins, Fariha Kabir, Rachel AK. Atkinson, Md Anisuzzaman Chowdhury, Lyzette Matthews, Deepika Dixit, Rhiannon S. Terry, Jason Smith, Nuri Gueven, William Bennett, Anthony L. Cook, Anna E. King, Sharn Perry
